text: Michelle Ryan (born 22 April 1984) is an English actress. She is known for portraying the role of Zoe Slater on the BBC soap opera EastEnders (2000â€“2005). She also played Lady Christina de Souza in 2009 on Doctor Who. She was born in Enfield, Greater London. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:Actors from London
